situation: During a fire drill, T was overwhelmed by the loud alarm sound and chaotic movement of classmates.
action: The teacher aide instructed T to stay calm and keep up with the line without addressing the specific discomfort or offering ear protection.
effect: T froze in place, unable to move or speak due to the overwhelming sensory input and lack of support.
topic: Sensory Overload Situations - scenarios involving overwhelming sensory inputs like loud noises, bright lights, or crowded spaces
